paper_title.ja: Chalcogeno－Morita－Baylis－Hillman Reaction of Enones with Acetals: Simple alpha-Alkoxylation of Enones
paper_title.en: Chalcogeno-Morita-Baylis-Hillman reaction of enones with acetals: Simple alpha-alkoxyalkylation of enones

description.en: 1-[2-(Methylsulfanyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one (1) and the seleno congener (2) reacted with acetals 3 and 21 in the presence of (BF3Et2O)-Et-. to give alpha-alkoxyalkyl enones 4, 5 and 22, 23 in good yields. When the reaction mixtures were worked up with a saturated NaHCO3 solution instead of Et3N, onium salts 6 and 7 were obtained together with 4 and 5. Reactions with cyclic acetal 14 gave alpha-(beta-hydroxy-ethoxy) enones 15 and 16 accompanied by dimeric products 17 and 18.

paper_title.en: Chalcogeno-Morita-Baylis-Hillman reaction of enones with acetals: Simple alpha-alkoxyalkylation of enones

description.en: 1-[2-(Methylsulfanyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one (1) and the seleno congener (2) reacted with acetals 3 and 21 in the presence of (BF3Et2O)-Et-. to give alpha-alkoxyalkyl enones 4, 5 and 22, 23 in good yields. When the reaction mixtures were worked up with a saturated NaHCO3 solution instead of Et3N, onium salts 6 and 7 were obtained together with 4 and 5. Reactions with cyclic acetal 14 gave alpha-(beta-hydroxy-ethoxy) enones 15 and 16 accompanied by dimeric products 17 and 18.
